name: Assault Force (17+) - Sniper Assassin Strike Force Edition
name_original: Assault Force (17+) - Sniper Assassin Strike Force Edition
description:
Get ready for an action packed sniper game where you play a member of an elite assault force on a mission to take out a nasty gang of bad guys out to get their hands on a bomb. Armed with a classic shooter and sniper gun, you need to take out all the bad guys.

FEATURES

- Two guns to choose from.
- Multiple levels.
- Awesome soundtrack.
- Headshots, sniper kills, and more.
